itunes:title: APR 22 2022 –  NEW DETAILS ON ELON MUSK’S PLAN B REVEALED
title: APR 22 2022 –  NEW DETAILS ON ELON MUSK’S PLAN B REVEALED
description:
Elon Musk says he has $48.5 billion in financing secured to buy Twitter. All of this as prosecutors investigating Hunter Biden subpoena documents from a paternity lawsuit that included tax records. Meanwhile, CNN is discontinuing their streaming service, CNN+ one month after launching, and the Tennessee legislature passes a bill requiring drunk drivers to pay child support if they kill a parent. 

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO 


To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
